author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: بِ إِلَيْكَ، كأَنَّ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ أَضاءَ سِرَاجُ حُبِّكَ وَمِصْباحُ وُدِّكَ. لا يُقَلِّبُهُمُ البَلايا عَنْ أَمْرِكَ، وَلا القَضَايا عَنْ رِضائِكَ.
translation: Methinks, the lamp of Thy love is burning in their hearts, and the light of Thy tenderness is lit within their breasts. Adversities are incapable of estranging them from Thy Cause, and the vicissitudes of fortune can never cause them to stray from Thy pleasure.
